channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP 2FA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP 2FA

item.title: CVE-2022-2891|2024-08-03T00:53:00.501Z -- unknown -- wp%202fa
item.description: The WP 2FA WordPress plugin before 2.3.0 uses comparison operators that don't mitigate time-based attacks, which could be abused to leak information about the authentication codes being compared.
